meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of technology.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone had a sleek and technoid design.
meanings.sent2: The technoid advancements in robotics have revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent3: The technoid gadgets in the spy movie were both futuristic and cool.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a technoid machine, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The technoid world of virtual reality opened up endless possibilities for exploration.

meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with technology.
meanings.sent1: As a technoid, he always had the latest gadgets before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The technoid spent hours coding and building computers in his spare time.
meanings.sent3: The technoid's idea of a perfect vacation was attending a tech conference.
meanings.sent4: She was a true technoid, with a passion for all things digital and electronic.
meanings.sent5: The young technoid dreamed of creating innovative tech solutions to help others.
